TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonToggleButton implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示功能区上的一个切换按钮控件。

span.span: Represents a toggle button control on a Ribbon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于显示是否选择了某个项。A can be used to show whether an item is selected. 您可以通过使用 对象的方法在运行时创建。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否按下了切换按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the toggle button is pressed or not pressed.

value.span: 如果按下了切换按钮，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the toggle button is pressed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时更改该属性。The property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 当用户单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击控件时, 在引发事件之前, 属性会发生更改。When the user clicks the control, the property changes before the event is raised.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the control.

value.span: 一个RibbonControlSize , 它表示控件的大小。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按钮是菜单的一部分, 则此属性不起作用。This property has no effect if the button is part of a menu. 菜单上显示的按钮的将始终设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`。 `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize`The `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize` of a button that appears on a menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`. 若要更改菜单上的大小, 请使用属性。To change the size of a on a menu, use the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置菜单中此 控件上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this control in a menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示控件上的文本。

span.span: A that represents the text on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 嵌套在另一个菜单中`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`, 并且父菜单的属性设置为,则会显示。The appears when is nested in another menu, and the property of the parent menu is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 如果将设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`, 则不会显示说明。 If the is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`, the description does not appear. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the control.
An that is displayed on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式为 PNG, 因为 PNG 格式的图像通过其 alpha 通道支持透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置了 属性, 则将忽略和属性。 If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性比其他两个属性提供的控件更多, 但它可能会变慢, 因为每次更新控件时, 都会将 image 对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序仅从解决方案中检索一次此映像, 以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 只能在设计时设置此属性, 因为该属性标识的图像将在事件中加载。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 当显示功能区时, 每个映像名称只引发一次。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后, 不能使用此属性更改控制图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像, 请将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性,并将对象的属性设置为要加载的图像。 Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果设置了属性或属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 与属性标识的图像相比, 属性所标识的映像的加载速度要快得多, 因为 Office 应用程序只会在首次显示功能区时从你的解决方案中检索该图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例为两个按钮缓存图像。The following example caches the images for two buttons. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将两个按钮添加到组。Add two buttons to the group. 4. 将两个图像添加到项目资源。Add two images to the project resources. 然后, 你可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置切换按钮的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the toggle button.

value.span: 此 当前的键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须有1到3个字符, 并且不得包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器", 用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时, 功能区上将显示键提示。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果 KeyTip 与内置控件或其他外接程序的 keytip 发生冲突, Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配不冲突的 KeyTip 值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523). 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置切换按钮上的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text on the toggle button.

value.span: 在此 控件上显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears on this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在 上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是标识`imageMso`所选图标的值的字符串。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关`imageMso`值的列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[2010 Office 系统外接程序:图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [2010 Office System Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果设置了属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the property is set. 由于图像缓存在 Office 应用程序中, 因此可以比属性标识的图像稍快地加载属性标识的图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给菜单。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a menu. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加切换按钮。Add a toggle button to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#8](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#8](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 如果控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置 的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the , if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 的位置（如果该控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the , if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能使用此属性来设置控件在组中的位置。You cannot use this property to set the position of a control within a group. 若要排列按钮, 请将其拖动到**功能区设计器**中的正确位置。To arrange buttons, drag them to the correct positions in the **Ribbon Designer**. 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到切换按钮上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the toggle button.

value.span: 当用户将指针移到切换按钮上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the toggle button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值的长度必须小于1024个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 设置属性时 , 值显示为的标题。 When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the . 此属性可在设计时和运行时进行更改。This property can be changed at design time and run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与 关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the is visible.

value.span: 如果与 关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置了设计器中`true`的、或属性, 则此属性将自动设置为。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property in the designer. 如果`true` `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`将属性设置为, 则此属性始终为。 This property is always `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the is visible.

value.span: 如果 的标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label for the is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`true` `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`将属性设置为, 则此属性始终为。 This property is always `true` if you set the property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. 可以在运行时更改此属性。This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 控件上方时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的长度必须小于1024个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 显示在 " 文本" 下。The appears under text. 与不同的是 , 会在字符串中启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string. 您可以在设计时和运行时更改。You can change the at design time and at run time.
